verses.verse: Thou <S%H859><s%> also, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> thee a <S%H3843>tile,<s%> and <S%H5414>lay<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and <S%H2710>portray<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H853>even<s%> Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

And <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H4692>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H1129>build<s%> a <S%H1785>fort<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H8210>cast<s%> a <S%H5550>mount<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it; <S%H5414>set<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> also <S%H5921>against<s%> it, and <S%H7760>set<s%> battering <S%H3733>rams<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it round <S%H5439>about.<s%>

Moreover <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> unto thee an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H4227>pan,<s%> and <S%H5414>set<s%> it for a <S%H7023>wall<s%> of <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> thee and the <S%H5892>city:<s%> and <S%H3559>set<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> it, and it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H4692>besieged,<s%> and thou shalt lay <S%H6696>siege<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it. <S%H1931>This<s%> shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Lie <S%H7901><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> also <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H8042>left<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7760>lay<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it: according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> thou shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> it thou shalt <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

For <S%H589>I<s%> have <S%H5414>laid<s%> upon <S%H853>thee<s%> the <S%H8141>years<s%> of their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> so shalt thou <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And when thou hast <S%H3615>accomplished<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>them,<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H8145>again<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> thy <S%H3233>right<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> I have <S%H5414>appointed<s%> thee each day for a <S%H3117>year.<s%> <S%H8141><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H8141><s%>

Therefore thou shalt <S%H3559>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4692>siege<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and thine <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be <S%H2834>uncovered,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it.

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H5688>bands<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2015>turn<s%> thee from one <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6654><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H6654>another,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> thou hast <S%H3615>ended<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H4692>siege.<s%>

Take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> also unto thee <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> and <S%H8184>barley,<s%> and <S%H6321>beans,<s%> and <S%H5742>lentils,<s%> and <S%H1764>millet,<s%> and <S%H3698>fitches,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> them in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3627>vessel,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> thee <S%H3899>bread<s%> thereof, according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> shalt <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thy <S%H6654>side,<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> thereof.

And thy <S%H3978>meat<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> shall be by <S%H4946>weight,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> a <S%H3117>day:<s%> from <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> shalt thou <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

Thou shalt <S%H8354>drink<s%> also <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure,<s%> the sixth <S%H8345>part<s%> of a <S%H1969>hin:<s%> from <S%H4480>time<s%> <S%H6256><s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> shalt thou <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And thou shalt <S%H398>eat<s%> it as <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H5692>cakes,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H5746>bake<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> with <S%H1561>dung<s%> that cometh <S%H6627>out<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> in their <S%H5869>sight.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Even <S%H3602>thus<s%> shall the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H2931>defiled<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> among the <S%H1471>Gentiles,<s%> <S%H834>whither<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I will <S%H5080>drive<s%> them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> I, <S%H162>Ah<s%> <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD!<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> hath <S%H3808>not<s%> been <S%H2930>polluted:<s%> for from my <S%H4480>youth<s%> <S%H5271><s%> up even <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> have I <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H398>eaten<s%> of that which dieth of <S%H5038>itself,<s%> or is torn in <S%H2966>pieces;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> there <S%H6292>abominable<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> into my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H7200>Lo,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H1241>cow's<s%> <S%H6832>dung<s%> <S%H8478>for<s%> <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H1561>dung,<s%> and thou shalt <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H5921>therewith.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> by <S%H4948>weight,<s%> and with <S%H1674>care;<s%> and they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> by <S%H4884>measure,<s%> and with astonishment: <S%H8078><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> they may <S%H2637>want<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4325>water,<s%> and be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another,<s%> and consume <S%H4743>away<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>
